mapper.select: SELECT pi.patient_id,pi.visitor_id,pi.patient_name,pi.gender,pi.age,pi.id_number,pi.insurance_status,pi.in_time,pi.out_time, l.location_id,l.location_name,pi.paid_time,pi.stay_status,pi.payment_status,u.unit_id,u.unit_name,e.employee_id,e.employee_name, clinic_d.disease_id AS clinic_disease_id, clinic_d.disease_name AS clinic_disease_name, admission_d.disease_id AS admission_disease_id, admission_d.disease_name AS admission_disease_name, discharge_d.disease_id AS discharge_disease_id, discharge_d.disease_name AS discharge_disease_name FROM patient_info pi LEFT JOIN unit u ON pi.unit_id = u.unit_id LEFT JOIN employee e ON pi.doctor_id = e.employee_id LEFT JOIN location l ON pi.location_id = l.location_id LEFT JOIN disease clinic_d ON pi.clinic_diagnosis_id = clinic_d.disease_id LEFT JOIN disease admission_d ON pi.admission_diagnosis_id = admission_d.disease_id LEFT JOIN disease discharge_d ON pi.discharge_diagnosis_id = discharge_d.disease_id
